document_data.mainbody:
asha Moonsong was an elven huntress made famous by her uncanny skill with a bow.
The main item of note in her possession was Tashas bow, a powerful longbow that was especially helpful against reptilian creatures.
Tasha Moonsong disappeared at some point before 1372 DR. She was an experienced huntress who embarked on numerous hunting expeditions. During one of those adventures, she was able to slay a roc with barrage arrow shots from 150 ft. away. Another adventure of note pitted her against basilisks while blindfolded to protect herself from their petrifying gaze.
Tashas last known location was the Lizard Marsh outside of Daggerford she went missing while hunting for prehistoric beasts that roamed the swamps.
